de.javasoft.swing
Interface IRotatableComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
DockbarLabel, JYButton, JYLabel
public interface IRotatableComponent

Rotatable components should implement this interface.

Version:
1.01, 12.04.2009

Returns current rotation.

Returns:
Current component rotation.
See Also:
IRotatableComponent.Rotation

setRotation

void setRotation(IRotatableComponent.Rotation rotation)
Set component rotation.

Parameters:
rotation - The component rotation. RIGHT means 90 degrees (clockwise), LEFT means -90 degrees (anti-clockwise)
